# SFSpeechError.Code.malformedSupplementalModel

**Case**

The custom language model file was malformed.

## Declaration

```swift
case malformedSupplementalModel
```

## Custom language model errors

- **SFSpeechError.Code.missingParameter**: A required parameter is missing/nil.
- **SFSpeechError.Code.undefinedTemplateClassName**: The custom language model templates were malformed.
